Services
Our packaging services include development, design, engineering, graphics, testing, specification management and consulting for packaging functions for our global clients.
See all services
Package Development & Engineering
From new design conceptualization, to prototype development, to trials and commercial production, we've got you covered every step of the way.
Package Design, Artwork, and Prototype Development
Our team has the creative and technical know-how to design and create top of the line packaging.
Mold Development, Qualification, and Management
Working with molds goes beyond the already existing. We also specialize in the development and validation of new or pilot molds.
Assembly Line & Machine Validation
Equity Packaging has been carrying out machine development programs for clients across the globe.
Specification Management
We are a professional team with hands-on experience implementing & maintaining specification management systems globally.
Market Research & Competitive Benchmarking
Package design is a critical variable in a successful product. Our expertise provides the guidance your product needs.
Resource Outsourcing
Clients receive the skilled support needed for short or long-term, onsite, and offsite projects.
Packaging-Line Troubleshooting
Our engineers have the necessary skills and knowledge to troubleshoot machinery.
Vendor Evaluation & Vendor Development
Our team of professionals evaluates vendors based on your requirements.
